Question: Taiyo Yuden Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Taiyo Yuden Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Passive solutions for automotive applications
- Technology showcase of R&D projects: MS-SOFC, DSSC, Multilayer Piezoelectric Actuator, Smell sensor
- Series of capacitors, inductors, RF devices showcased at LVCC West Hall, booth #3400, Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility section
- Capacitors include conductive polymer hybrid aluminum electrolytic capacitors for enhanced automotive functionality
- Inductors include LCCN Series of MCOIL metal power inductors for ADAS sensors, car infotainment systems, TPMS, and more
- RF devices cater to a wide range of needs with multilayer ceramic, FBAR, and SAW technologies
Summary_cn:
太阳日东股份有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 汽车应用 passiv 解决方案
- 研发项目的技术展示：MS-SOFC、DSSC、多层压电致动器、气味传感器
- 在LVCC西展厅的展位号3400，车载技术与先进移动技术展区展示系列电容器、电感器和射频器件
- 电容器包括用于提升汽车功能的导电聚合物混合铝电解电容器
- 电感器包括用于ADAS传感器、汽车信息娱乐系统、TPMS等的LCCN系列MCOIL金属电源电感器
- 射频器件采用多层陶瓷、FBAR和SAW技术，适应各种需求
